abstract: Markets surged on bargain-hunting, raising the question of whether stocks have fallen enough to reflect the declines in profits that would accompany a potentially long recession.
snippet: Markets surged on bargain-hunting, raising the question of whether stocks have fallen enough to reflect the declines in profits that would accompany a potentially long recession.
lead_paragraph: A tug of war is in full swing on Wall Street and those pulling for stocks came out way ahead on Tuesday for the first time in a while.

headline.main: Even as Dow Soars 11%, Skeptics Lurk
headline.print_headline: The Dow Soars 11%, but Skeptics Lurk

abstract: At 3:50 p.m., the Dow Jones industrial average was nearly flat for the day, an encouraging end to a volatile session and, perhaps, a sign that some manner of relief had started to come to Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: At 3:50 p.m., the Dow Jones industrial average was nearly flat for the day, an encouraging end to a volatile session and, perhaps, a sign that some manner of relief had started to come to Wall Street.

headline.main: Sense of Calm Is Swept Away in the Final Minutes
